code: /**  * Transform a {@link TypeSerializerSnapshot} that was previously associated with {@code this} {@link TypeSerializer}.  *  * @param legacySnapshot the snapshot to transform.  * @param <U> the legacy snapshot's serializer data type.  *  * @return a possibly transformed snapshot.  */ <U> TypeSerializerSnapshot<T> transformLegacySerializerSnapshot(TypeSerializerSnapshot<U> legacySnapshot).
